description: Episode of Series "The Biological sciences". An examination of the DNA based molecular control system. Investigates the primordial origins of DNA, the master molecule of life, and the structure of proteins, fats and carbohydrates. Also discusses current theories of how DNA is organised into chromosomes which store and transmit vast amounts of genetic information. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels
